text: 1:20 1 Atriviba 10:1Egha atrivim bizir avɨribar men azangsɨgha, me ko mɨgɨa gari, men fofozim Babilonɨn fofozir gumazibar fofoziba, bar moghɨra me gafira. Atrivimɨn irebar mɨngaribagh fogha dar gun mɨgeir gumaziba ko, kukunir gumaziba bar, me Judan gumazir 4plan kabagh afiraghan kogham. Bar puvatɨ.
